title: Exchange: Adding Inbound Support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
description: Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards in order to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding inbound support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online. Look for another roadmap item which covers outbound mail. Note: This release (Preview) has been pushed to May to allow us to enhance our serviceâ€™s security measures. We apologize for any inconveniences.
